text: Ni:Sanka ame amara payagambarone khulla purava api mokalya ane teni sathe pustaka ane trajavum avatarita karyu, jethi loko n'yaya para adaga rahe ane ame lokhanda utaryu jemam sakhata'i ane takata che, ane loko mate bija ghanam phayada che ane a mate pana ke allaha jani le ke teni ane tena payagambaroni madada vana dekhe kona kare che, ni:Sanka allaha takatavara ane mahana che
